dt: {bc}to cause to continue or increase by sexual or asexual reproduction
{bc}to cause to spread out and affect a greater number or greater area {bc}{sx|extend||}
{bc}to foster growing knowledge of, familiarity with, or acceptance of (something, such as an idea or belief) {bc}{sx|publicize||}
{bc}to transmit (something, such as sound or light) through a medium
{bc}to travel through space or a material
used of wave energy (such as light, sound, or radio waves)

et: Latin {it}propagatus{/it}, past participle of {it}propagare{/it} to set slips, propagate, from {it}propages{/it} slip, offspring, from {it}pro-{/it} before + {it}pangere{/it} to fasten {ma}{mat|pro-|}, {mat|pact|}{/ma}
shortdef: to cause to continue or increase by sexual or asexual reproduction
to cause to spread out and affect a greater number or greater area : extend
